snippet: An explosion in a mountain village on Sunday left at least seven civilians dead after a joint American and Afghan military raid killed four Taliban fighters there, Afghan officials said.
abstract: Explosion in mountain village in eastern Afghanistan leaves at least seven civilians dead after joint American and Afghan military raid kills four Taliban fighters there.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and SHARIFULLAH SAHAK

lead_paragraph: An explosion in a mountain village on Sunday left at least seven civilians dead after a joint American and Afghan military raid killed four Taliban fighters there, Afghan officials said.

headline.seo: Afghan Civilians Killed in Blast After Commando Raid
headline.main: Afghans Killed After Allies Target Taliban
headline.print_headline: Afghans Killed After Allies Target Taliban
